await (await checkIn.checkIn(1)).wait();
);
  "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512"
  "CheckIn",
const checkIn = await ethers.getContractAt(
await ticket.ownerOf(1);
await (await ticket.mintTo(admin.address, "1.json")).wait();
(await ticket.nextTokenId()).toString();
);
  "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3"
